reviews.text: AboutWe started operations with 1 yacht in 1985. Today Explore Whitsundays offers 17 different vessels that visit the Whitsunday Islands. From day tours up to 6-night liveaboards, deluxe island stay packages to backpacker accommodation. All Tours visit Whitehaven Beach on Whitsunday Island. The partners are Australian Tall Ship Cruises, Southern Cross Sailing, Prima, Eureka Sailing, Whitsunday Adventurer, Whitsunday Bullet. Feel free to contact us directly with any questions about the Whitsundays, the seasons, prices and specials! Welcome to Explore Whitsundays!Read moreAirlie Beach, Queensland, AustraliaMeets animal welfare guidelinesCallEmailVisit websiteContactOperator informationAwardsTravellers' Choice2025Suggest edits to improve what we show.Improve this listing
